properties.name: manon.admin.default-admin.username
properties.description: An admin user is created in database with this username if no admin found in database during start-up.

properties.name: manon.admin.default-admin.password
properties.description: An admin user is created in database with this password if no admin found in database during start-up.

properties.name: manon.matchmaking.job.start
properties.description: Start matchmaking job on this server.

properties.name: manon.batch.user-snapshot.snapshot.max-age
properties.description: user snapshot max age in days.

properties.name: manon.mongodb.version
properties.description: MongoDB version, used to configure test embedded database.
